name: Xenoverse Fighter
description:
The evil Frieza Force has regrouped in the thousands on a revenge mission to the Earth. Z Fighters are struggling to cope with the invasion. Only you can defeat Frieza and save the Earth!

The world is full of great martial artists. Only through 100x Gravity Training, learning Kaio-ken, passing Goku and other masters' tests, will you be recognized as the strongest Saiyan!

The strong don't have to be lonely. You will lead your Alliance partners to fend off aggression, ascend to the top, and share all the treasures and glory!

Be it the Angel's Ultra Instinct or God of Destruction's Power of Destruction, you can master them all. As the fighter closes to god, the universe's balance is in your hands!
Being the strongest in Universe 7 will no longer satisfy you. You will compete with the best fighters of other parallel universes. Will you be invincible as always? There's only one way to find out!
